summary: You still dont know how to make ingame screenshots without use of fraps or steam?
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone

I have seen a couple of times people, that still dont know how to make screenshots without the help of fraps or steam.
You just need to put only one line in Skyrim.ini and after that you can make screenshots anytime by pressing PrintScreen and they will be put inside your main game folder in bmp format..

Open your Skyrim.ini (under system folder/users/documents/my games/skyrim) and put there 

[Display]
bAllowScreenshot=1

If you dont have [Display] in it, put both lines, if you do, put only the second line.


You dont need to download the skyrim ini in the download section its there only so there is something. Its my personal ini. You can use it, but be carefull so you dont ovewrite yours by mistake.


I dont take any credits for this. Its not my work i found it in some ini about a month ago or more, try it. it worked so i use it since. The author himself did put the ini out freely, so i am sure he wouldnt mind. I cant credit him as i dont remember who it was. I just want to help fellow players.Hopefully there will be no problems with anyone.
author: Unknown
